Notice.Text: All day travel for up to 5 people (minimu of 1 adult and maximum of 2 adults travelling at any one time.)
Available from 1800 and valid until 0359 on the following day.
Surrey Student card holders can purchase Child rate tickets for cash on the bus, or students can purchase a Child Metrovoyageur (on the key ony) for longer validity tickets. .

TimeInterval.Name: Evening
TimeInterval.Description: Available from 1800 and valid until 0359 on the following day.

UserProfile.Name: Child
UserProfile.Description: 5-13 year olds are normally charged half adult fare on singles and returns. Discounts are available on Metrorider and Metrovoyager ticktes. 14 & 15 year olds may travel at child rate on any Metrobus service, if one of the advertised proofs of age is supplied.

SalesOfferPackage.Name: Metrovoyager - paper ticket
SalesOfferPackage.Description: This ticket bought on the bus gives you unlimted travel on all our services across our entire network, including both the Crawley, Horsham, and Redhill & Reigate Metrorider areas. ALso valid on Bighton & Hove bus services.
